person.persName: Benjamin Hardy Stoval (Blandville, Ballard County, Kentucky, post master)

body.p: Blandville, Ballard County, Kentucky, store clerk and post master. Kentucky native. Son of J.H. Stoval and Hannah Stoval. Married to Martha F. Stoval. Father of Robert W. Stoval. Postmaster of Blandville, Kentucky, in December 1858. Clerk in store in Blandville in 1860.
